attributes.action: Allow grassroots football to keep running and playing
attributes.additional_details: To allow children and volunteers to carry on doing what they love and let them enjoy themselves through this tough time and also it is a form of their exercise a week
attributes.background: we want them to allow grassroots football to carry on playing and allow clubs to carry on the way they were

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow Grassroots football to keep going for juniors: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557169

Allow outdoor amateur football to continue during lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557467
